creator: jacarlso@katun.com
text:
JMeter 1.8 -- When the Follow Redirects option is selected for an HTTP Request, 
it appears that it stops after the first redirect (even if there are more 
redirects).  This occurs in only one place in the application I'm testing, so 
it's not a serious problem for me, but it's not the expected behavior.

Thank you!

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
